mapper.select: select v.*, u.nickname as nickname, u.face_img, u.face_img_thumb from nuoquan.vote v left join nuoquan.user u on u.id = v.user_id where 1 = 1 order by v.create_date desc
select v.*, u.nickname as nickname, u.face_img, u.face_img_thumb from nuoquan.vote v left join nuoquan.user u on u.id = v.user_id where 1 = 1 and v.status = 2 order by v.create_date desc

select v.*, u.nickname as nickname, u.face_img, u.face_img_thumb from nuoquan.vote v left join nuoquan.user u on u.id = v.user_id where 1 = 1 and v.status = 1 and (TO_DAYS(NOW()) <= TO_DAYS(v.expiry_date)) order by v.create_date desc
mapper.update: update nuoquan.vote set comment_num=comment_num+1 where id=#{voteId}
mapper.select: select v.*, u.nickname as nickname, u.face_img, u.face_img_thumb from nuoquan.vote v left join nuoquan.user u on u.id = v.user_id where 1 = 1 and v.id = #{voteId}

select v.*, u.nickname as nickname, u.face_img, u.face_img_thumb from nuoquan.vote v left join nuoquan.user u on u.id = v.user_id where 1 = 1 and v.status = 1 and v.id = #{voteId} order by v.create_date desc
select v.*, u.nickname as nickname, u.face_img, u.face_img_thumb from nuoquan.vote v left join nuoquan.user u on u.id = v.user_id where 1 = 1 and v.user_id = #{userId} order by v.create_date desc

select v.*, u.nickname as nickname, u.face_img, u.face_img_thumb from nuoquan.vote v left join nuoquan.user u on u.id = v.user_id where 1 = 1 and v.user_id = #{targetId} and (v.status = 1 or v.status = 0) order by v.create_date desc
